duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive new sales by targeting and acquiring Tier 1 logos and Mid-segment players.
Preferred engagements include long-term, outcome-driven projects.
Focus on business/technology areas such as Networking (Datacom, Routing & Switching), Embedded Devices Software, Industrial IoT, Cybersecurity, Native Cloud Development, and Cloud Transformations.
Utilize existing Incedo Technology partnerships to target new clients.
Lead and drive new client acquisition in the ISV market segment to grow Product Engineering business.
Act as a thought partner on the GTM strategy for the Product Engineering vertical.
Stay up to date with new technology trends and competitive landscape in the shared technology areas.
Prepare/review proposals and presentations, negotiate sales, package discounts, and long-term contracts with clients.
Act as a bridge between solutioning team and the client by gathering requirements, identifying key client pain areas, and win themes.
Collaborate with the solutioning team to present a tailored proposition marrying Incedo’s key USPs and client requirements.

education_certification.credential: Must be a Graduate (Engineering background preferred), Good to have – master’s in business
